entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers early this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
